data.title: My Husband, Olu Jacobs, Is Alive and Well – Joke Silva
data.meta_description: Veteran Nollywood actress, Joke Silva has dismissed rumours going round on social media that her husband, Olu Jacobs has passed away. data.meta_site_name: Trending News - | Breaking News, Today's News & Headlines - Latest News in Nigeria
data.text:
Veteran Nollywood actress, Joke Silva has dismissed rumours going round on social media that her husband, Olu Jacobs has passed away.

According to a news report, Joke Silva said “her husband is alive and doing just fine.”

Also, TVC news spoke with the president of the Actors guild of Nigeria, Emeka Rollas, as well as veteran actor, Segun Arinze, who denied the rumours.

Recall that Jacobs, a multiple award-winning actor, has been battling dementia for some time.

The “death” of Jacobs has been rumoured a number of times since November 2021 when his actress wife, Joke Silva, opened up on the health struggles of her husband.
